name: Special limitations
text:
§657-10  Special limitations.  This part shall not extend to any action which is, or shall be, limited by any statute to be brought within a shorter time than is herein prescribed; but the action shall be brought within the time limited by the statute. [CC 1859, §1048; RL 1925, §2647; RL 1935, §3918; RL 1945, §10429; RL 1955, §241-9; HRS §657-10]
 
Cross References
 
  Wrongful death actions, see §663-3.
